name: Angie Runner
description:
I did this game to make people knowing again that old classic games like space invaders are always the best game also after a lot of years later it came out

I put it to free but if u want u can donate to support my games developing passion

That's the new build because I had problem with uploading files.

Enjoy and donate!!!

Play with W and S 

If the game keys dont go wait until you die and and press reastart button to make the game run perfectly
